headline: How The Narrative Around Uber Technologies (UBER) Is Shifting With AV And AI Repricing
summary: Uber Technologies has just seen its fair value estimate nudged slightly lower, from about US$112.06 to about US$110.72 per share, reflecting a very modest recalibration rather than a wholesale rethink. The updated model threads a slightly higher discount rate of about 8.05% together with a very small adjustment to the long term revenue growth assumption, now about 14.60%, as analysts weigh both enthusiasm and caution around autonomous vehicles and AI. Stay tuned to see how you can keep on top...

headline: Jefferies and BofA Remain Bullish on Uber Technologies (UBER)
summary: Uber Technologies, Inc. (NYSE:UBER) is one of the best major stocks to invest in right now. Uber Technologies, Inc. (NYSE:UBER) received rating updates from Jefferies and BofA on January 6. Both maintained a Buy rating on the stock, with Jefferies maintaining a $120 price target and BofA reiterating a price target of $119. Jefferies anticipates […]
